item.description: This is an open event for Parents Without Partners members and Parents Without Partners-Single Parents meetup group. This is a very family friendly park. Tickets $8 each. The game is on Sunday at 5:05 PM. Come for a great afternoon at the park. Vendors are usually there with give small giveaways. Kids can run the bases after the game. Mascots entertain during innings. If you haven't been with your kids, you should plan on coming to this event. E-mail me to arrange ticket payment/pickup/mailing. PLAY BALL! Sandi
item.name: Lowell Spinners Minor League Baseball game
